About.title: Connecting opportunity across Syria
About.subtitle: We are a Syrian-focused hiring and tenders platform that bridges organizations, companies, and applicants through verified listings, bilingual experiences, and zero applicant fees. #SyrianTalent #SyrianWork

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: Connect Syrian talent with reputable company jobs and authentic tender opportunities—without fees or paywalls.

safeAccess.title: Safe, Transparent Access
safeAccess.description: We verify organizations before they post tenders and never charge applicants. Suspicious activity can be reported from every listing.

builtForAll.title: Built for All Roles
builtForAll.description: Job seekers browse roles, organizations share tenders, and companies hire talent under one collaborative platform.

proudlyServing.title: Proudly serving Syria
proudlyServing.description: We highlight Syrian organizations, NGOs, and companies so professionals can stay, work, and grow within Syria. Every listing is reviewed with Syria's regulatory environment in mind, and our bilingual (English + Arabic) UX ensures local teams collaborate seamlessly with global partners.

whatGuidesUs.title: What guides us
whatGuidesUs.fairAccess: Fair access: no applicant fees, bilingual support (English & Arabic), and RTL-friendly designs.
whatGuidesUs.trustTransparency: Trust & transparency: organizations must complete profiles and provide licenses before posting tenders.
whatGuidesUs.security: Security: Supabase policies protect data, and suspicious listings can be reported instantly.
